translation.en: I just don't want all that attention.

translation.en: Oh, don't you lie to me.
translation.fr: Ne me mens pas.

translation.en: so you could get a free trip to Legoland.

translation.en: well, you just about peed your pants, you were so excited.

translation.fr: En fait, Mme Jackson, Infinity, j'ai vu tous les sujets sur toi

translation.en: Oh, God, they're so inspiring.
translation.fr: exaltants,

translation.en: But I really think that this could be something even bigger.

translation.en: I think this could be a national news story.

translation.en: You know, at the risk of sounding vulgar, it's worth remembering

translation.en: that you could parlay something like that into serious, regular income
translation.fr: rappelons qu'il serait facile de transformer ça en salaire régulierrien qu'avec Instagram.

translation.en: just off of Instagram alone.

translation.en: Wait a minute.
translation.fr: Attends.

translation.en: -We could make some money on this? -Absolutely. Oh, absolutely.

translation.en: Well, hot damn!

translation.en: [Payton] If it would be at all helpful,

translation.en: I'd be happy to provide you with a cash loan that could be used for anything.

translation.en: -[stammers] Anything. -[laughs] I like the sound of that.

translation.en: You know, I must say, I like the sound of your voice.

translation.en: Really? Yeah?

translation.en: Yeah, I really-- It's got a real melodic tone to it.

translation.en: Is that-- Are you from the South?

translation.en: Well, I am a country girl.

translation.en: I knew it. I knew it.

translation.en: -West-goddamn-Virginia. [chuckles] -Of course.

translation.en: Yeah, I drove all the way to California from Martinsville.

translation.en: -I don't think I have. -[chuckles]

translation.en: -Stop it. Stop it. Just stop it! -What?!

translation.en: You're using your money and your interest

translation.en: I'm so sorry.

translation.en: like nothing happened, but it did, I know that it did.

translation.en: You're right, Infinity. You're right.

translation.en: I'm a fake.

translation.en: You shouldn't believe anything I say,

translation.en: because I don't know that I believe it either.

translation.en: I think that's why I want you for a running mate.

translation.en: You're authentic and you're real,
translation.fr: Tu es authentique et tu es vraie.

translation.en: and I can't even face the truth because...

translation.en: because the truth is... [sobs]

translation.en: ...the truth is that I loved him.

translation.en: Oh, my God. I loved him so much. [gasping]

translation.en: And now he's gone.

translation.en: I'm so sorry, Payton.

translation.en: I believe you now.

translation.en: [whispers] Hey, I believe you.
translation.fr: Je te crois.

translation.en: Okay?
translation.fr: D'accord ?

translation.en: We got her.
translation.fr: On la tient.

translation.en: Because that's what life's all about. It's not about avoiding adversity,
translation.fr: Car c'est ça, la vie. Il ne faut pas contourner l'adversité,

translation.en: it's how we handle the hard times when they come barging into our lives,
translation.fr: mais gérer les épreuvesqui surgissent dans nos vies

translation.en: destroying everything we hold dear.

translation.en: And that's why I've got someone very special with me today.

translation.en: Now, this is a girl that we've all met, but...
translation.fr: On l'a tous croisée

translation.en: she's someone that I don't think a lot of us really know.
translation.fr: mais peu d'entre nous la connaissent.

translation.en: And I think that the reason that I find her so inspiring
translation.fr: Elle est une source d'inspiration

translation.en: is because... I look at my life,
translation.fr: parce que quand je regarde ma vie,et ces dernières semaines,

translation.en: and what's happened in the past few weeks, even the past few hours,
translation.fr: parce que quand je regarde ma vie,et ces dernières semaines, même ces dernières heures,ce n'est rien comparé

translation.en: does not even compare
translation.fr: même ces dernières heures,ce n'est rien comparé

translation.en: to the struggles that this young woman has to face every moment of every day.
translation.fr: à ce que cette fille endurechaque moment de chaque jour.

translation.en: And yet, she looks at the future... with hope and optimism
translation.fr: Pourtant, elle regarde l'aveniravec espoir, optimisme

translation.en: and a sense of humor.
translation.fr: et beaucoup d'humour.

translation.en: Infinity, you inspire me.

translation.en: That is why I'm proud to introduce you as my running mate today.

translation.en: Ladies and gentleman, the next vice president of Saint Sebastian,

translation.en: Infinity Jackson!
translation.fr: Infinity Jackson.

translation.en: Thank you.

translation.en: Thank you, my gosh, thank you. Uh...

translation.en: I guess Payton's right.

translation.en: My life hasn't always been easy, but my Nana-- my Nana always says,
translation.fr: Ma vie n'a pas toujours été facile,mais ma Nanette dit toujours

translation.en: “Infinity Maybelline Jackson..."

translation.en: Right, Eric, sorry.

translation.en: You douchebag, my name is Andrew.

translation.en: I'm here, I'm alive, I'm with all of you beautiful people.

translation.en: She's scamming everyone, you know that, right?

translation.en: It's all a big scam. She's not sick.
